name: Greedy Rogue
description:
A classic Roguelike where you play as a rogue looting treasure from a Dragon's Lair under a volcano. You've picked a time when the Dragon is out terrorizing the local village. Unfortunately, you didn't anticipate Dragonlings. But you're greedy and anxious, and continue anyway.

Made in 7 days for the 2022 7DRL jam.

Goal

Collect as much treasure as you can, and make it out alive.

Controls

  • Arrows to move a direction
  • Period wait in place
  • Mouse hover to describe lit objects
  • 1-5 Use an artifact

Gameplay

  • Manage health and anxiety in a dynamic environment
  • Restore anxiety by picking up gold
  • Move into things to interact
  • Wait to have enemies come to you, but this increases your anxiety
  • Avoid hazards such fire, lava, pitfalls, chasms, etc
  • Experiment with artifacts, each one does something different, and some give a passive effect
  • Make it through 3 chambers before reaching the exit

Challenges

  • Escape with 100% of the gold collected
  • Escape with 0% of the gold collected (I believe this is possible)
  • Escape with or without artifacts

Good luck!  Here be dragon(lings)s.  Hopefully nothing else...

There will be bugs.

Post 7DRL Changes

  • Fixed a bug where an item wouldn't leave the artifact list
  • Added and improved animations
  • Changed the Pitfall sprite to something else
  • Made rocks smashable by bumping them when they can't move
  • Added a wait move that costs anxiety
